subject: Baseball
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox slugger David Ortiz and Baltimore pitcher Kevin Gregg were suspended four games and fined Thursday for their parts in a July 8 benches-clearing brawl.
snippet: The Red Sox slugger David Ortiz and Baltimore pitcher Kevin Gregg were suspended four games and fined Thursday for their parts in a July 8 benches-clearing brawl.
